```{r, echo=FALSE, results ='hide', message=FALSE}
library( shinyLikert )
testData2 = createTestData( 100, 10, input, output )
```


```{r}
    fluidPage( 
      renderShinyLikert( 
        testData2,
        split    = c( "difficulty", "gender", "country" ),
        positive.order = TRUE   # ???
      ) 
    )
```

```{r}
    fluidPage( 
      renderShinyLikert( 
        testData2,
        height  = c(500,800),
        dropdown = c("gender","difficulty"),
        group = "country"
      ) 
    )
```
